features.title: Claude Code Task Tool Integration Hook
features.description: Implement the actual integration mechanism to intercept Claude Code's Task tool calls and automatically inject context before agent execution. This is the critical missing piece that enables the entire auto-context injection system.
acceptance_criteria: No breaking changes to existing workflows

features.title: Performance Benchmarking and Optimization
features.description: Implement comprehensive performance benchmarking to validate the system meets targets: <500ms injection speed per agent, <1s for 10 parallel agents, 80% cache hit rate. Add optimization for slow paths.

features.title: Integration Test Suite for Context Injection
features.description: Create comprehensive integration tests for the auto-context injection system including end-to-end scenarios, parallel agent spawning, context inheritance validation, and detection accuracy measurement.

features.title: Context Injection Documentation and Guides
features.description: Create comprehensive documentation for the auto-context injection system including setup guides, configuration reference, troubleshooting guide, and examples for extending the system.

tech_debt.title: Production Hardening for Context Injection
tech_debt.description: Add comprehensive error handling, circuit breaker patterns, monitoring/alerting implementation, and graceful degradation for the context injection system to ensure production readiness.
tech_debt.impact: Without proper hardening, the system could cause agent failures or performance degradation in production, affecting all LLM operations.

epics.title: ATLAS-001 Auto Context Injection System
epics.description: Automatic LLM-Driven Context Injection System - Provides automatic context to agents spawned via Task tool with zero manual intervention
